features: African Black Soap Body Lotion from Nubian Heritage banishes dull, dry skin with hard-working, skin-loving ingredients that leave behind radiant skin and glowing skin
Luxuriate in this silky African black soap lotion, body butter and moisturizer every day to smooth away the appearance of dark spots on blemish prone skin and enhance your natural glow
Whether its ashy elbows, rough feet, cracked skin on hands our African Black Soap body lotion and dry skin treatment gives your skin the all-day hydration it needs
Also made with cocoa pod ash and certified organic shea butter, coconut oil, jojoba oil and essential oils for body moisturizer that heals and nourishes even oily skin and combination skin
Massage body butter, body lotion and moisturizer into dry skin or combination skin. Daily use will result in healthier-looking clear skin
Nubian Heritage skin care lotion is never tested on animals but always free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, paraffin, gluten, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances and artificial colors
body.description: African Black Soap Body Lotion from Nubian Heritage banishes dull, dry skin with hard-working, skin-loving ingredients that leave behind radiant skin and glowing skin. Luxuriate in this silky African black soap lotion, body butter and moisturizer every day to smooth away the appearance of dark spots on blemish prone skin and enhance your natural glow. Whether its ashy elbows, rough feet, cracked skin on hands our African Black Soap body lotion and dry skin treatment gives your skin the all-day hydration it needs. Also made with cocoa pod ash and certified organic shea butter, coconut oil, jojoba oil and essential oils for body moisturizer that heals and nourishes even oily skin and combination skin. Massage body butter, body lotion and moisturizer into dry skin or combination skin. Daily use will result in healthier-looking clear skin. Nubian Heritage skin care lotion is never tested on animals but always free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, paraffin, gluten, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances and artificial colors. For centuries, African Black Soap has been used in Africa to cleanse and care for the skin. Historical references to Shea Butter, a staple of African pharmacology, date back to the reported Shea Butter caravans of Cleopatra's Egypt.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Envelop your skin in a warm and comforting fragrance. This aromatic body lotion, blended with African Black Soap, Aloe Vera, Oats, and Vitamin E, helps comfort dry skin, leaving it feeling soothed and balanced.

Comforts Dry Skin This body lotion is rich in essential fatty acids, is blended with African Black Soap, Aloe Vera, Oats, and Vitamin E to help comfort dry skin. Ancient Remedies, Modern Wellness Solutions Nubian Heritage offers culturally-authentic products infused with naturally-derived ingredients inspired by global ancient philosophies. Cruelty-Free, Heritage Ingredients We make our products using globally-sourced ingredients and never test on animals. Humble Beginnings Nubian Heritage is the brainchild of two New Your street vendors. In 1992, fresh out of college and without jobs, Rich and Nymea embarked on a mission to produce luxurious products from traditional African recipes.

Nubian Heritage Patchouli & Buriti Body Lotion, 13 oz Nubian Heritage African Black Soap Body Wash, 13 oz Nubian Heritage African Black Soap Deodorant, 2.2 oz Main Benefit Envelop your skin with an uplifiting and exotic fragrance. This aromatic body lotion helps smooth and moisturize skin, leaving it with a beautiful glow. This gentle, sikly body wash lathers and diffuses a comforting and warm fragrance for a calming experience, leaving dry skin feeling comforted and balanced. This 24-hour deodorant is the cruelty-free way to stay sweet-smelling all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is amazing. I’ve been using Nubian Heritage for a very long time. It’s moisture that locks in. Not like those other moisturizers that you apply and literally 10 min later your skin is dry again. Plus the scent is not heavy, so I can wear my cologne without the moisturizer interfering with my cologne. I recommend for any one who has really dry skin like me. Use it everyday and everywhere face, body, hands, feet… it’s a good product if you are looking for a new moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a great lotion that doesn't leave a sticky/greasy residue on my skin and is clean! This lotion is luxurious! Its almost like a body butter. It smells amazing and goes on smoothly. absorbs nicely into the skin. Keeps my skin feeing soft and moisturized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizer for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I tend to be allergic to a lot of products but this has been amazing for my skin. The scent is nice and light, pretty neutral. It’s a great moisturizer, but it is thick - more of a cream to body butter consistency. A little goes a long way.I kind of wish they did sell it in tubs since it can be hard to get the product out after you’re halfway through it and it has settled back down. To avoid the frustration we just store it upside down so it’s always ready to squeeze.I hope they never change the ingredients. Been using this for 5+ years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great stuff but hard to get out of the bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is the best long-lasting moisturizing lotion I've ever come across. It is very thick, however, so I transfer it to a jar and mix it with a small amount of water, to make it easier to spread on your skin. The stuff is so thick that it's impossible to get to the last few inches in the bottom of the container, so I have to cut the bottle in half and scoop out the bottom part with a case knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fade dark spots and well-moisturized your skin
reviews.reviewText: I've been dealing with blemishes on my back especially during summer. Apparently I'm not doing too well in humid weather. For the longest time I refused to wear anything that expose my back because I was so conscious about how it looks.I've been using this lotion along with African black soap body wash and the results were astonishing. The spots on my back were faded and I haven't gotten any new bumps ever since I use them.The lotion is pretty thick, thicker than your typical lotion which I like. It goes on your skin very smoothy and it smells pretty nice. This product works and it works slowly so give it time to start working. It took me a whole bottle to see results that I'm happy with. I will continue to use it and I don't think I'll use anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this product for years. It’s much better than what you can get at the stores when you put the product on these your skin feeling moisturize throughout the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful moisturizing cream
reviews.reviewText: I love Nubian Heritage lotions, although they are so thick, I think they qualify more as a cream. Very nice scent, it feels wonderful, and makes your skin feel very soft. Great price with subscribe and save.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite lotion
reviews.reviewText: I am sensitive to smells. The scent is sweet, but not sweet enough to trigger a headache. The lotion is gentle, soothing, and creamy. I have used it on my face with no problems. I like Nubian Heritage products. They seem like an easy alternative to making your own lotion.I have had issues squeezing the lotion out of the bottle, if you are not careful to keep the lid closed. I'm sure that could be fixed by rinsing the lid out.
Aucune hydratation.Lait compact impossible à faire sortir du flacon il faut presser le flacon comme une malade,bref j’ai pas pu terminé cette lotion.Je déconseille. Voir photos
I love this cream it's thick and lasts even after washing dishes! I have extremely dry skin and it feels so good all over. I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 16, 2015
reviews.reviewText: it very dry... but smell lovely.
Très très bonne lotion pour le corps et avec une bonne odeur
